means: 表示爱慕的话语，亲热的表示

sentence.Network_en: No term of endearment crossed their lips.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们彼此没说过爱慕的话。

sentence.Network_en: This endearment indicated the highest degree of delight in the old cooper.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个称呼是老箍桶匠快乐到了极点的表示.

sentence.Network_en: To every endearment and attention he continued listless.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于每一种亲爱的表示和每一种的照顾,他一直漫不在意.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... andes n. 安第斯山脉 endearment n. 亲爱, 钟爱 humanity n. 人性, 人类, 博爱, 仁慈.

英语专业八级考前拉力赛答案与详解（2）_TEM8试题 ... “trendy” 时髦，潮流的。 “endearment” 亲近，亲热，友好。 “macadam” 碎 …
endear的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... endear oneself to 使自己为人所喜爱 endearment n. 钟爱, 宠爱; 亲爱的行为.

list.abs: it's enthralling and endearing stuff , especially when your team scores and the little blobs representing players all hurtle off to the corner flag to form a bundle …它的迷人和可爱的东西，尤其是当你的球队成绩和球员都代表了赫特尔国旗的一角，形成一个捆绑小斑点…
Timetabling has also helped endear professors to the changes ., 制定时间表也有助于让教授们喜欢上课程改革.
The endearing sweetness of her manners so charmed Bertram ., 她那甜蜜可爱的姿态叫勃特拉姆为之倾倒.
and the life that people endears ., 人们钟情的生活.

entry.def: An endearment is a loving or affectionate word or phrase that you say to someone you love.

example.ex: No term of endearment crossed their lips.
example.tran: 他们彼此没说过爱慕的话。

auth_sentence.content: Nor did he call her by a diminutive or an endearment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor did he call her by a diminutive or an endearment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor did he call her by a diminutive or an endearment.

auth_sentence.content: "Mr. Higginson," she began, with no endearment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Mr. Higginson," she began, with no endearment.

auth_sentence.content: "My rabbit" sounded like the endearment of some sentimental tart.
auth_sentence.res_content: "My rabbit" sounded like the endearment of some sentimental tart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "My rabbit" sounded like the endearment of some sentimental tart.
